column4: does anyone know how to setup a ubuntu machine to be a network gateway
i have a dynamic ip address for the internet connection
anyone know anything on setting up a network gateway machine
is it possible to use one with a dynamic ip DSL connection
i was using a linksys router but know want use this
can i route my internet connection through my ubuntu box then through my linksys to my other machines

I am trying to setup a network gateway, to authenticate users, store data, and be a firewall. At present I have the ubuntu box with to network cards in them. One hooked up to the net, and the other to my router WAN
i am unsure where to go from here
I would use a router livecd for now until you do some reasearch
yes since bind is the dns server
seems like someone tried to exploit your vnc
I would if I was you do some searching since you might have software installed that command installed but then again it is a window command
doesn;t mean your using root powers though
sudo for cli or gksu for graphical
